FrageText.de: Wie verhalten Sie sich, wenn Sie damit rechnen, einen längeren Bremsweg zu haben als das Vorderfahrzeug?
FrageText.en: How would you conduct yourself if you would have to count on having a longer braking distance then the vehicle in front of you?
FrageText.hr: Kako postupate ako računate s tim da imate duži put kočenja od vozila ispred Vas?
FrageText.sl: Kako ravnate v primeru, ko računate na to, da je vaša zavorna pot daljša od vozila pred Vami?
FrageText.tr: Öndeki araçtan daha uzun bir fren yolunuzun olacağını hesaplarsanız, nasıl davranırsınız?

de.Text: Ich halte einen größeren Sicherheitsabstand von ca. 3 bis 5 Sekunden ein

en.Text: I would maintain a safety distance of 2 seconds
I would maintain a larger safety distance of approximately 3 - 5 seconds
I would maintain a safety distance of 1 second
While driving I would be prepared to brake

hr.Text: Održavam veći sigurnosni razmak od oko 3-5 sekundi

sl.Text: Obdržim večjo varnostno razdaljo od 3 do 5 sekund

tr.Text: 3-5 saniye gibi uzun bir güvenlik mesafesi bırakırım
